comment: /**  * Returns true, if state was restored from the snapshot of a previous execution. This returns always false for  * stateless tasks.  */
code: /**  * Returns true, if state was restored from the snapshot of a previous execution. This returns always false for  * stateless tasks.  */ boolean isRestored().

comment: /**  * Returns an interface that allows for registering operator state with the backend.  */
code: /**  * Returns an interface that allows for registering operator state with the backend.  */ OperatorStateStore getOperatorStateStore().

comment: /**  * Returns an interface that allows for registering keyed state with the backend.  */
code: /**  * Returns an interface that allows for registering keyed state with the backend.  */ KeyedStateStore getKeyedStateStore().
